sentences.english: Every forum worker and manager is a chessman of company.

sentences.english: Various pieces are set down in a designed order in the two ranks close to the player.

sentences.english: And you are a chessman in this game.

The utility model is composed of a plurality of chessmen and a chessboard.

sentences.english: Unlike any other piece, it skips over pieces in the way.

sentences.english: Peasants were the pawns in this war of attrition.

sentences.english: Of course, you may use white and black buttons if go chess is not available. Continued in part 2 www. slideshare.

sentences.english: She starts to set the pieces back in their starting positions.
sentences.chinese: 她开始将所有的棋子归置到他们开始的位置。

sentences.english: Walk chess of the only rule is a pawn that can walk to surround to combine inside out opponent.
